img_summary: The image depicts a character in a dimly lit, narrow corridor with walls adorned with carved figures. The character is wearing a beaded necklace and has tattoos on their body. A text overlay reads "Non-White" and another line states, "The face of the Destined One? It will fit me just as well." This suggests a dialogue or narrative element within the game, possibly involving identity or destiny.
